meanings.definition: frizzles (verb): to make a sizzling or hissing noise
meanings.sent1: The bacon frizzles in the hot pan.
meanings.sent2: I love it when the water frizzles as it boils.
meanings.sent3: The campfire crackled and frizzled, creating a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks frizzled and popped in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The frying oil frizzles as the chicken is dropped in.

meanings.definition: frizzles (noun): small pieces of food that are fried until crisp and curled
meanings.sent1: I can't resist the delicious frizzles of fried shrimp.
meanings.sent2: The frizzles of potato chips are always a hit at parties.
meanings.sent3: The frizzles of bacon added a tasty crunch to the salad.
meanings.sent4: The chef garnished the dish with a sprinkle of frizzles.
meanings.sent5: The frizzles of onion rings were perfectly golden and crispy.

meanings.definition: frizzles (adjective): having a frizzy or curly texture
meanings.sent1: Her frizzles hair looked beautiful in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The poodle's fur had adorable frizzles all over.
meanings.sent3: The frizzles edges of the blanket made it extra cozy.
meanings.sent4: The frizzles pattern on the fabric added a fun touch.
meanings.sent5: The frizzles texture of the rug felt soft underfoot.
